intro: Ixianthes retzioides, commonly known as the narrow-leaved ixian, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, opposite leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest undergrowth. Its ornamental value comes from its delicate foliage and fragrant blooms.
